alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 7:51PM EDT until August 12 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Hamilton County in eastern New York... Central Herkimer County in eastern New York... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 751 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ohio, or 19 miles northeast of Utica, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Indian Lake, Speculator, Ohio, Lake Pleasant, Newport, Poland, Cold Brook, Lewey Lake Campground, Northwood, Moffitt Beach Campground, Russia, Norway, Nobleboro, Perkins Clearing, Clockmill Corners, Piseco, Wilmurt Corners, Morehouseville, Hoffmeister and Hurricane. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
